title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Declines 4.5% as All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Polygon (POL) and Sui (SUI) both dropped 8.3% from Thursday, leading the index lower.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2616.04, down 4.5% (-123.93) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

None of the 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BTC (-2.5%) and BCH (-3.6%).

Laggards: POL (-8.3%) and SUI (-8.3%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The entire CoinDesk 20 Index declined 4.5% with all 20 assets trading lower, led by significant drops in POL and SUI.
